abstract: Michael Woodford, dismissed Olympus chief executive, says he gave evidence of fraud to Britain’s Serious Fraud Office, which led to him being forced out of the company.
snippet: Michael Woodford, the chief executive who was dismissed on Friday, said he gave evidence of fraud to Britain’s Serious Fraud Office.
lead_paragraph: Michael Woodford, the chief executive who was dismissed on Friday, said he gave evidence of fraud to Britain’s Serious Fraud Office.

headline.main: Ex-Chief Executive of Olympus Ties Ouster to His Claim of Fraud by the Company
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chief Executive of Olympus Ties Ouster to His Claim of Fraud by the Company
headline.seo: Michael Woodford Accuses Olympus of Wrongdoing
